summary: This is an email chain from December 10, 2018, between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and another recipient, discussing scheduling a brief call to prepare for an upcoming event on Wednesday. The tone is informal, with a joke about changing a name.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of an email requesting a brief call to touch base about items in preparation for Wednesday.

events.title: Preparation for Wednesday event
events.description: Mentioned as the reason for needing a brief call to touch base about items.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York NY 10007
keyFacts: Email correspondence dated December 10, 2018, involving an Assistant U.S. Attorney from SDNY.
Discusses scheduling a brief call to prepare for an upcoming event on Wednesday.
Includes an informal joke about changing a name, indicating a familiar relationship.
Originates from the Southern District of New York's office at One Saint Andrew's Plaza.
